title.en: Blue Archive - Sensei Gyakutai Yume Senpai Imouto Gainen Series (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 先生虐待ユメ先輩妹概念シリーズ

altTitles.ja-ro: Sensei Gyakutai Yume Senpai Imouto Gainen Series (Blue Archive)

altTitles.en: The Sensei And Little Sister Yume's Abuse Concept Series (Blue Archive)

title.en: Gakuen Idolm@ster - P ga P Shitemasu (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: PがPしてます (学園アイドルマスター)

description.en:
It's a story of cute idols and their Producer. Kotone-chan is cute!
A compilation of Gakumas doujin manga.

title.en: Naze ka S-kyuu Bijotachi no Wadai ni Ore ga Agaru Ken

altTitles.ja: なぜかS級美女達の話題に俺があがる件

description.en:
High school girls Sara Himekawa, Rin Kohinata, and Yuna Takamori are called “S-class beauties,” admired by everyone for their unparalleled beauty. While the school is abuzz with questions about the mysterious guy that the girls are talking about, Haruya Akasaki, a quiet boy in the class, is feeling anxious. In fact, the subject of the girls' talk is Haruya! He definitely does not want to draw that much attention at school, so he tries to make the girls lose interest in him, but it all backfires and…

This is a school harem comedy between a plain guy and “S-class beauties."

altTitles.ja: 十二人の死にたい子どもたち

description.en: The story is a locked-room mystery where 12 kids go into an abandoned hospital to give up on life. In the room where they meet, a boy is already lying dead, and no one knows who he is.

title.en: Kirby of the Stars: Daily Round Diary!

altTitles.ja-ro: Hoshi no Kirby - Kyou mo Manmaru Nikki!

altTitles.ja: 星のカービィ 今日もまんまる日記！

description.en: He's pink and round! He's a glutton! A new manga series about Kirby, the airheaded but irresistible hero of the video game world! Lots of copy abilities are here! Plus, the familiar members such as King Dedede, Waddle Dee, and Meta Knight, as well as such and such characters from previous Kirby titles, are all gathered together! The definitive version of the hilarious Kirby manga!

title.en: Fukushuu o Koinegau Saikyou Yuusha wa, Yami no Chikara de Senmetsu Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: 復讐を希う最強勇者は、闇の力で殲滅無双する

altTitles.ja-ro: Fukushuu wo Koinegau Saikyou Yuusha ha, Yami no Chikara de Senmetsu Musou Suru

altTitles.en: The Strongest Hero Who Longs For Revenge Will Peerlessly Annihilate With The Power Of Darkness
The Hero Who Seeks Revenge Shall Exterminate with Darkness
The Dark Massacre of the Vengeful Hero
The strongest brave who craves for revenge, extinguish with the power of darkness

altTitles.ru: Герой, жаждущий мести, уничтожит врагов Силой Тьмы

altTitles.es-la: La Oscura Masacre del Héroe Vengativo

altTitles.zh-hk: 渴望復仇的最強勇者、以黑暗之力所向披靡

description.en:
Raoul, who had defeated the demon king as the strongest hero, should have become the savior of the world. Having his treasured companions and family killed by power-hungry aristocrats, he was executed with false charges brought against him by the princess. Just before his life collapsed, at last, his heart fell into darkness.

"I'll tear those traitors from limb to limb. Burn them at the stake. Sever them to pieces. Skewer them. I'll kill every one of those bastards without mercy and make them taste hell's suffering.....!!!"

Obtaining the power of darkness, Raoul was revived. Sneering, he vowed revenge. "Oh, I'm looking forward to it – from now on, I'll bask in their blood as I please."

Several days after the hero's revival in the imperial capital where flowers bloomed in profusion, the parade that would advance towards tragedy began.
description.fr: Raul qui avait vaincu le roi démon et reconnu comme étant le héros le plus fort aurait dû devenir le sauveur du monde. Mais ses chers compagnons et sa famille ont été tués par des aristocrates affamés de pouvoir, et lui exécuté suite à de fausses accusations portées contre lui par la princesse. Juste avant que sa vie ne s'effondre, son cœur tomba finalement dans les ténèbres. "Je déchirerai ces traîtres de membre en membre. Brûlez-les sur le bûcher. Coupez-les en morceaux. Embrochez-les. Je tuerai tous ces salauds sans pitié et je leur ferai goûter les souffrances de l'enfer…. ! ! ! !" ! Ayant obtenu le pouvoir des ténèbres, Raul fut ressuscité. En tout ricanant, il jura de se venger. "Oh, j'ai hâte d'y être - à partir de maintenant, je me prélasserai dans leur sang comme il me plaira." Quelques jours après la renaissance du héros, dans la capitale impériale où les fleurs fleurissaient à profusion, le défilé qui allait mener vers la tragédie débuta.
description.ja: 最強の勇者として魔王を倒したラウルは、世界の救世主となる――はずだった。私利私欲を貪る貴族たちにより、仲間や家族を殺されたラウルは、偽りの罪で処刑される。命が潰えるその直前、ついに彼の心は悪に墜ちた。……あの裏切り者どもを、火炙りにして殺す。八つ裂きにして殺す。串刺しにして殺す。地獄のような苦しみの中で、憎き者たちを全員容赦なく殺してやる……!!!!　闇の力を手に入れ蘇生を果たしたラウルは、復讐を誓い、嗤う。「ああ、たのしみだな。――これからあいつらの血を、思う存分浴びることができる」　勇者の復活から数日後。花の咲き乱れる王都で、残虐を極めた復讐無双がはじまるのだった――。

altTitles.ja: オシバナ！

description.en: A romantic comedy centered around "The School Prince" bringing the tense conflict of young boys and girls to the breaking point!
description.ja: 「学園の王子様」なヒロインを巡って少年少女がせめぎ合う一触即発ラブコメディ

description.en:
Sophie, a boy with vampire and human blood, is transferred from an orphanage to an institution called Clan. The school houses vampire boys who have reached their Cocoon period, or puberty in human terms. Sophie has a fateful encounter with a boy named Ul while being coldly greeted by the vampires around him. As Ul continues to research the “power of immortality” that vampires once possessed, he learns of the existence of TRUMP, the original vampire that is said to live forever, and begins to crave eternal life.

Eventually, Sophie and Ul become entangled in the deep fate surrounding the legend of immortality...

A manga adaptation of the origin story of playwright Kenichi Suemitsu’s popular series! A Gothic school fantasy that beautifully spins the conflicts of impressionable and sensitive boysー!
description.ja: 吸血種<ヴァンプ>と人間の血が流れる少年ソフィは、養護院からクランと呼ばれる施設へと入所した。そこは繭期――人間でいうところの思春期を迎えた吸血種の少年たちが集う学園。周囲の吸血種から冷ややかな目で迎えられる中、ソフィはある一人の少年と運命的な出会いを果たす。劇作家・末満健一の人気シリーズの原点となる物語をコミック化!! 繊細かつ多感な少年たちの葛藤を美しく紡ぎ出すゴシック学園ファンタジー!
description.vi: Câu chuyện xoay quanh Sophie Anderson - một con lai giữa con người và ma cà rồng (Dhampir), bị khinh ghét vì sự không thuần khiết. Tuy vậy, Sophie vẫn vượt lên những trở ngại với trái tim cao quý và luôn đầy tự hào về dòng máu của mình.

description.en: Lin Ling is unfortunate in everything she does… Until the day she met Fang Wan, a kind and perfect upperclassman. She unconsciously grew attracted to her. Somewhere in the vast universe, there is always someone who is closely connected with you, and if fate allows it, you will never be alone.

title.en: Chiisana Kimi to, Koe wo Tooku ni

altTitles.ja: ちいさな君と、こえを遠くに

description.en:
Sota former vocalist of a popular band, having lost his former voice, he moves to a new high school where there is no one he knows to try to live quietly as Kanata Fujinami.
However, when he meets Sora, an elementary school girl who wants to become a voice actor, Kanata's dormant heart is moved and the story of Sora's journey toward her dream begins.
description.ja: 大人気バンドのボーカルをしていたソウタは、当時の声を失ったことで、誰も知らない転校先の高校で本名の藤波奏太（ふじなみかなた）としてひっそり暮らそうとしていた。だが、声優になりたい女子小学生・空（そら）と出会ったことで、奏太の心の変化と、空の夢へ向かう物語が始まる――。

altTitles.ja: バスロマンス
スケットダンス

description.en:
The hilarious misadventures of the "Sket Dan"; a group of high-schoolers who help out people as part of their club activity. Himeko, the hot-headed ex-delinquent with a soft spot for cute things and a taste for strange food. Switch, the brainy otaku who only talks via a computerized speech-application. And Bossun, the atypical leader of this looney bunch, with the amazing power to… concentrate very hard!

- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **SKET DANCE** (2015)

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)
description.ru:
"Скет Данс" - школьный клуб, чья деятельность весьма необычна - помогать в решении абсолютно любых проблем, которые возникли у учеников или даже учителей. А члены этого чудо-клуба, не менее странные личности, чем сам клуб: Боссун - гений дедуктивного мышления, Химэко - боевая единица группы и Свич - "мозг" и хакер мира сего. Вы всегда можете к ним обратиться, если осмелитесь…  
  
- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)

description.en: A mystery murder case shatters Lan Zhiqing's serene and blissful life into pieces. The past she has long forgotten returns in the form of a nightmarish case, encroaching ever the closer... Shocked, Lan Zhiqing discovers that the most dangerous existence may just be the person she shares a bed with.

altTitles.ja: お狐ギャルの片喰さん

description.en:
A very ordinary and serious high school student, Kamou-kun. Though his days are filled with diligent study, his concern lies in his childhood friend, Katabami-san, who interferes with his studies every day. And to make matters more complicated, Katabami-san's true identity is... a fox spirit!?

---
**Alternative Raw:** [Nico Nico Seiga](https://sp.seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66393)
description.ja:
幼馴染みは…化け狐！？

ごく普通の真面目な男子高校生、賀茂（かも）くん。勉強に励む日々だったが、悩みは幼馴染みの片喰（かたばみ）さんが毎日勉強の邪魔をしてくること。しかも片喰さんの正体は……化け狐だった！？

altTitles.ja: ローゼンガーテン・サーガ

description.en: Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert… I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat… ahem, heroes!
description.pt-br: Depois que sua vila foi atacada por um bando de ladrões, Lynn se levantou para proteger seus amigos e o mundo com a ajuda de uma Espada Mágica, que contém a alma de um herói...? Uma história de fantasia/ação com uma heroína sem precedentes(?)

altTitles.ja: 大室家

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

altTitles.ja: 高校球児 ザワさん

description.en:
Risa Miyakozawa, known as Zawa-san, is a member of Nissen High School's prestigious baseball club, but she's a girl… She trains and practices hard knowing she'll never be allowed to play in a real game. A quirky manga, focused more on the characters around Zawa-san reacting to her rather than baseball heroics or high school romance.  
  
Nominated for the 3rd Manga Taisho Award (2010).

Ye Ji-an, the only S-class guide in Korea, was often called the “useless guide” due to her unique trait of having a 0% matching rate with all espers. After failing to match with an esper from Russia and on her way back home, she is suddenly swept away by a gate manifestation and wakes up alone in a strange temple-like place. The world she has traveled to through the gate is the continent of Wisrode, filled only with espers, and in this place, Ji-an is the only guide…

altTitles.ja: 雑音
電幻
凸デコボコ凹
春眠
電 でんげん 幻

description.en:
A collection of oneshots.

• Braces Kiss
• Mismatched
• Virtual Illusion: *In order to preserve our love forever, we made a decision together... We believed that this was the best choice for the two of us.*
• Spring Slumber
• The Noise
• Someone Else
• Puppy Love

altTitles.ja: シャドーハウス
シャドーハウス カラー版

description.en:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
description.es:
Nobles sombras sin rostro que viven en una vasta mansión, atendidos por muñecos vivientes que pasan gran parte de su tiempo limpiando el hollín emitido por sus misteriosos maestros.  
  
Sigue la historia de Emilyko, una joven y alegre muñeca viviente, mientras aprende sus deberes como asistente de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.ja: 不思議な洋館に住む、 顔のないシャドー一族と、 世話係の“生き人形”たち。 彼らが織りなす、 摩訶不思議な日常とは…？
description.ru: Безликие теневые дворяне, живущие в огромном особняке, сопровождаемые живыми куклами, которые проводят большую часть своего времени, очищая сажу, бесконечно испускаемую их таинственными хозяевами.
description.es-la: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.pt-br: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.

title.en: The Villainess' Blind Date Is Too Perfect

altTitles.en: The Villainess' Boyfriend Is So Perfect
The Villain's Match Is Too Perfect
The Devil's Match Is Too Perfect

altTitles.zh: 恶女的相亲对象太完美了

altTitles.en: The Villainess' Match Is Too Perfect

description.en:
Possessed by the rumored evil woman ‘Yvonne Argenthoz’! In her original work, she was a villain who met a tragic end because she was jealous of the female lead with her male lead, but after being possessed by her, Yvonne resolves to enjoy the life of a diamond spoon in peace.

But the novel and development are different?!

“If it’s Yvonne's… fishery, I think it’ll be fine.”

From the perfect match going straight to Yvonne out of the blue, and the unexpected dark side of the story. Will Yvonne be able to live a peaceful diamond spoon life as planned?

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Monster Breeder ~Cheat wa Arukedo, Nonbiri Ikusei Shiteimasu~

altTitles.ru: Укротитель монстров в другом мире ~Лениво дрессирует монстров с помощью читов~

altTitles.ja: 異世界モンスターブリーダー　～チートはあるけど、のんびり育成しています～

altTitles.th: Isekai Monster Breeder -มีสูตรโกงแต่ก็จะเพาะเลี้ยงอย่างค่อยเป็นค่อยไปครับ-

altTitles.zh: 异世界魔物培育家~带着外挂悠哉养成中

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界魔物培育家~帶著外掛悠哉養成中

description.en: When sent to a different world, Souta was given the unpopular profession of "Monster Tamer." However, Souta also got the skill "Absolute Domination" which gives him a 100% chance to capture anything!
description.es: Cuando fue enviado a un mundo diferente, Souta recibió la impopular profesión de "Domador de monstruos". ¡Sin embargo, Souta también obtuvo la habilidad "Dominación Absoluta" que le da un 100% de posibilidades de capturar cualquier cosa!
description.ru: Когда главного героя, Соуту, отправили в другой мир, ему досталась профессия "Укротителя монстров". К тому же, ему дали способность "Абсолютное доминирование", которая даёт ему 100% возможность получить всё что угодно.

altTitles.ja: シガンバナ

description.en:
In this seemingly peaceful country, there lives a hitman that hunts down others of his kind - an assassin of assassins. Before eliminating his targets, he always questions their motives for killing - this is his way of embracing his destiny.

 From the author of "Until Your Bones Rot" and "The Shadows of Who We Once Were," Utsumi Yae presents a thrilling drama about the lives of those existing on the edge between life and death.

altTitles.ja: お忍び同棲

description.en: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

title.en: I Won't Let Mistress Suck My Blood

altTitles.ja: ご主人様には吸わせません！

description.en: Matilda is looking for a job and a place to stay, and ends up in a large mansion known as the "Haunted House." The owner of the house, August, is a beautiful, soft-spoken woman, and Matilda is attracted to her and decides to work for her as a maid. However, that night, Matilda finds that her master has transformed.
description.id: Matilda mencari pekerjaan dan tempat tinggal, dan berakhir di sebuah rumah besar yang dikenal sebagai “Mansion Berhantu”. Pemilik rumah, August, adalah seorang wanita cantik yang bersuara lembut, dan Matilda tertarik padanya dan memutuskan untuk bekerja untuknya sebagai pembantu. Namun, pada malam itu, Matilda mendapati bahwa majikannya telah berubah.

altTitles.ja: インソムニア

description.en:
20 nights, 20 terrifying stories. Masaya Hokazono tells us the horrific stories he has experienced as well as those that have been told to him. Even in a technologically advanced modern Japan, traditional spirits never cease to torment the living.

Included oneshots:
Volume 1: Hanashicha Ikenai (Don't Tell), Kengai Imouto Kaidan (Out of Bounds: Sister Ghost Story) [Story: Kihara Hirokatsu]
description.ja:
赤い妹・ネットの妖怪・宇宙人・電車を徘徊する女・深夜のコンビニに集まる亡者たちがあなたを今夜も“インソムニア(不眠症)”にする！

外薗昌也待望のホラー短編集!

altTitles.ja: キラキラしても、しなくても

description.en: Sparkling love is not the only kind there is. Keita is a high school student who likes his friend Masato. However, his love could not be more different from the sort of sparkling love often seen in BL… This is a delicate, bittersweet story of adolescence.
description.ja: キラキラした恋、だけじゃない。高校生の慶太は、友だちの正人のことが好き。しかし、BLでよく見るようなキラキラした恋と自分の恋は、似ても似つかなくてーー。ほろ苦く繊細な、青い春の物語。
description.es-la: Un amor deslumbrante no es el único tipo que hay. Keita es un estudiante de preparatoria al que le gusta su amigo Masato. Sin embargo, su amor no está ni cerca de ser como los amores deslumbrantes que se ven seguido en los BL… Esta es una historia agridulce y delicada de la adolescencia.

altTitles.ja: Chichi to Higegorira to Watashi

altTitles.en: Dad, the Beard Gorilla, and I
Dad, the Bearded Gorilla, and I
Papá, el Gorila Barbudo, y Yo

altTitles.ja: 父とヒゲゴリラと私

description.en: After losing her mother to a tragic accident, 6-year old tomboy, Michiru, finds a suspicious person moving into her precious home: her dad's giant younger brother Kouji, the 'Beard Gorilla'. While awkward at first, it doesn't take long for the two to develop a familiar bond that looks more like that of a brother and a sister, than that of niece & uncle.
description.zh:
开心的日子也好，寂寞的日子也好，都是大家大家珍贵的回忆。
在同一屋檐下，哥哥+弟弟+哥哥的女儿‼ 一部有点不寻常的家庭喜剧‼

altTitles.ru: Гарем рабов в лабиринте другого мира

altTitles.ja: 異世界迷宮でハーレムを

altTitles.en: A Harem in the Fantasy World Dungeon
Harem in the Labyrinth of Another World

description.en: A man was about to commit suicide and decides to search for a way to die in the internet, but then he found an odd site that asked a lot of questions and had a point based system that allows you to create skills and abilities for a character. He took interest in it and when he finished setting his character he was asked: "You will now be transported to a world with the settings you choose, coming back is not possible, do you still accept?" Without thinking much of it he pressed YES and found himself in another world with the skills and abilities he chose to have.
description.ja:
少年のチートでハーレムな冒険譚が始まる!!
「人生なんてこんなもん――」。世の中に絶望した少年が見つけたとあるサイト。この世界で生きづらいなら異世界で生きてやれ、とクリックした先は、ホントに異世界!? しかもボーナスポイントを振りまくったおかげで最強の男に生まれ変わった彼は、アイドル級の美少女を手に入れる権利を得られそうで…!? 生まれ変わった少年のチートでハーレムな冒険が今始まる！
description.pt-br: Um homem estava prestes a cometer suicídio e decide procurar uma maneira de morrer na internet, mas depois encontrou um site estranho que fez muitas perguntas e teve um sistema baseado em pontos que permite que você crie várias habilidades para um personagem . Ele se interessou por isso e, quando ele acabou de definir o seu personagem, lhe foi perguntado: Você será agora transportado para um mundo com as configurações que você escolher, voltar não é possível, você ainda aceita?. Então, sem pensar muito, ele Pressionou SIM e encontrou-se em outro mundo com as habilidades que escolheu ter.

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main

altTitles.th: ตั๋วโกงชีวิต

description.en:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---
**Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/ticket-hero/list?title_no=2195)
description.fr:
L'esprit de Lee Kyung Ho était complètement bouleversé à l'idée de mettre fin à ses jours à cause du harcèlement et de la perte de sa mère. Il essaie, mais il est sauvé. Sa détermination à se suicider séduit Sierra, une faucheuse sinistre qui lui offre plus tard un pacte. Ce pacte lui permet d'emprunter les pouvoirs des morts dans leur vie antérieure en échange de plusieurs années sacrifiées de sa vie. Afin d'atteindre ce qu'il souhaite, il finit par l'accepter.  
  
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771)
description.ru: Ли Кён Хо был поглощен идеей суицида, из-за издевательств в школе и гибели его матери. Очередная попытка, но спасен. Его решимость покончить с собой каким-то образом соблазняет Сиеру, мрачного жнеца, который позже предлагает ему контракт. Этот контракт даёт возможность заимствовать способности и силы мертвых из их предыдущей жизни, в обмен на силу, он должен жертвовать годами, которые ему остались на этой земле. Ради достижения того, чего он желает, он всё таки соглашается на сделку.
description.es-la: Lee Kyung Ho queria terminar su vida debido al acoso y la pérdida de su madre. Intenta hacerlo, pero no lo consigue. Su determinación de suicidarse de alguna manera fracasa, una persona llega y le ofrece un contrato. Este contrato lo bendice con la capacidad de tomar prestados los poderes de los muertos en su vida anterior a cambio de sacrificar años de su vida. Para lograr lo que desea y el acepta el trato.

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！アンソロジーコミック

description.en:
Bocchi the Rock! anthology by various mangaka.

---
**Volume 1**
**Cover**: [Chiba Sadoru](https://mangadex.org/author/d5f4317f-c206-4421-b87e-581d65d86c13)
**Illustrations**: [Matsuda Hikari](https://mangadex.org/author/d024d115-01fd-45d7-b92f-0af7434fd4c9/matsuda-hikari), [Uzaki Uso](https://mangadex.org/author/ed1f402e-0550-446a-b3d5-8cfee979104c), Instant, [Hoshi](https://mangadex.org/author/7f08c8d4-98a3-4fee-92ff-7f618c6ab63a), [Souma Hajime](https://mangadex.org/author/4f2c1169-ad59-444c-a0a9-dab195ee35f6), HOJI, Iwawa (イワワ)

**Author list**:
1. Yuichi
2. Takeo Kyuujuu
3. Shirou Urayama
4. Totsuno Takahide
5. Uraya Nagi
6. Uchino Maiko
7. Confure
8. Fuku Kitsune
9. kashmir
10. Oomameda
**Extra comics**: Kokamumo, Konparu & Fujishima Pepo

title.en: I'm Curious About the Dog-Eared JK Sitting Next to Me.

altTitles.ja: となりの席の犬耳JKが気になる

altTitles.ja-ro: Tonari no Seki no Inumimi JK ga Kininaru

description.en:
She's a second-year high school student with a single all-consuming question: Will the boy she likes ever really notice her? He's the school's most notorious juvenile delinquent and he's suddenly come to a shocking realization: He's got a huge crush, and now he must tell her how he feels.  
  
Chapter 232 does not exist, there's no chapters missing.  
  
Special Chapters:  
  
bb1 What's up Doc (February 9, 2010)  
Diamonds on the Inside (November 30, 2016)  
Give it Away (March 15, 2017)  
Hello Again (November 8, 2017)
description.pt-br:
Ela é uma estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio com uma única pergunta que a consome: será que o garoto de quem ela gosta realmente a notará? Ele é o delinquente juvenil mais notório da escola e de repente chega a uma conclusão chocante: ele tem uma paixão enorme e agora deve contar a ela como se sente.

O capítulo 232 não existe, não falta nenhum capítulo.

Capítulos Especiais:

bb1 E aí, doutor (9 de fevereiro de 2010)
Diamantes por dentro (30 de novembro de 2016)
Como percebeu (15 de março de 2017)
Olá de novo (8 de novembro de 2017)

description.en:
Chae Yu-ra is an ordinary girl who likes to watch online game broadcasts. She becomes the sole sponsor of an unknown streamer, Choi Ji-hyuk, who plays a virtual reality game called Constellation. But one day, she wakes up inside the game and discovers that she is Choi Ji-hyuk's constellation, which means she can grant him wishes and powers.

Choi Ji-hyuk, on the other hand, is an elite hunter who is determined to take revenge on the constellation that abandoned him in the past. He is unaware that his constellation is actually Chae Yu-ra, the girl he despises for her lack of skill at the game. How will they relate to each other in this dangerous world full of mysteries?
description.es-la:
El único error que he cometido hasta ahora es ver una transmisión sin espectadores de un juego online.
Mi único crimen fue patrocinar a alguien duramente.
ㅤ
Pero ahora lo entiendo.
¡Hacerme pasar por esta terrible experiencia es demasiado duro!
ㅤ
"¡No podemos perder más tiempo"
"¡Espera un minuto, déjame comprar esta armadura"
ㅤ
"¿Qué es esto?"
Me pregunté mientras veía esa transmisión antes de que eso pasara.

___________________________________________________
ㅤ
Choi Ji-hyuk miró fijamente el artículo que venía como recompensa de una Mazmorra de Clase S.
Era un objeto obtenido que había arrebatado a los otros Cazadores que intentaban obtenerllo.
ㅤ
"No importa cuanto impida este objeto la destrucción del mundo"
"No importa si es un objeto por el que arriesgué mi vida"
"Incluso si muero, seré miserable, por eso, si es he de morir, al menos quiero ver la cara de esa maldita Constelación"
ㅤ
Pero, ¿quién hubiera pensado que esa Constelación era una chica que parecía tener poco más de 20 años?
ㅤ
"Chae Yu-ra"
ㅤ
Él lo lamentó por ella, quien había vivido una vida normal y pacífica toda su vida, desafortunadamente, nunca tuvo la intención de abandonar a su Constelación.
ㅤ
"Dime que soy lo más importante para ti"
ㅤ
Al menos así será hasta que llegue el fin del mundo
ㅤ
"Dímelo"

altTitles.th: สามรั่วตัวแสบ

altTitles.ja: みつどもえ

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.
The second season of Cho Seok's Tidal Universe masterpiece, Planetary Human. So… prepare yourself to be mindfucked.

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

altTitles.ja: キン肉マン

description.en:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

altTitles.ja: カッコウの許嫁

altTitles.th: รักอลวนคนสลับบ้าน

description.en: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé! The curtain raises on a romantic comedy of intertwined fates that begins with being switched at birth!
description.es: Una comedia romántica sobre Nagi yendo a una reunión con sus verdaderos padres, y sobre Erika, que está atormentada por un compromiso no deseado!
description.fr: Nagi est un élève sérieux passionné par ses études. Un jour, alors qu'il est en deuxième année, il découvre qu'il a été échangé à la naissance avec une fille. Espérant garder leurs enfants biologiques et adoptifs, leurs parents décident qu'ils vont se fiancer pour pouvoir rester en famille. Mais Nagi est déjà amoureux d'une autre fille...
description.it: Nagi Umino, studente al secondo anno di una prestigiosa scuola preparatoria, ha scoperto di essere un bambino scambiato alla nascita. Un giorno, mentre si sta dirigendo all'incontro con i suoi veri genitori, incontra Erika Amano, una strana ragazza promessa in sposa nonostante la giovane età. Rifiutando di sposarsi, costringe Nagi a far finta di essere il suo ragazzo per cercare di far desistere i genitori dall'idea del matrimonio. Nagi e Erika scopriranno di avere molto più in comune di quanto pensino!
description.ja: 赤ちゃんの頃に取り違えられ、今は名門私立に通う高校 2年の海野凪。ある日、これから許嫁に会いにいくという超お嬢様女子高生・天野エリカと偶然出会い、彼氏のフリをしてくれと半ば強引に頼まれてしまう。だが、その時の二人は知る由もなかった。エリカは凪と取り違えられた子どもで、凪はエリカの許嫁相手だということを……。
description.ru: Романтическая комедия о Наги, идущем на встречу со своими настоящими родителями, и о Эрике, которая мучается из-за нежеланной помолвки!..
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica sobre Nagi que está indo se encontrar com seus verdadeiros pais e sobre Erika, que é atormentada por um casamento indesejado!

title.en: Tsuki no Oki ni Mesu mama

altTitles.ja: 月のお気に召すまま

altTitles.en: By the Whims of the Moon

description.en: In middle school, Ayumu kept getting teased and pranked by Runa, even though he's a year below her. Now that she's in her second year of high school, she's ready to be the experienced senpai for the incoming freshman Runa.
description.ja: 生意気な後輩男子にイジワルされまくり…でも、本当は好きの裏返し!?　歩は、ややポンコツな高2女子。新学期、歩の通う高校に、中学時代の後輩男子・月（るな）が入学してくる。月は、勉強も運動もデキて、早速モテモテ。彼氏ができない歩のことをバカにしてくるけど…!?
description.pt-br: No fundamental, Ayumu continuava sendo provocada por Runa, apesar de ele estar um ano abaixo dela. Agora que ela está no segundo ano do ensino médio, e está pronta para ser a Senpai experiente do calouro Runa.

description.en: Let the standard adventure story of extremely normal(?) people begin!

I see what Angels see and do what Demons do. Those are the words a psychopath named Dennis saw when he found "The Channeler"... A powerful artifact that two massive evil corporations (Ravenfort) and (Blue Hand)will stop at nothing to get it back. at the same time Dennis Trauma haunts his day and night, while his adopted brother is still suffering from the loss of his wife ten years ago to a mysterious disease. #thriller_mystery
#mystery #thriller

title.en: Yamiochi Yuusha no Haishin Haishin~Tsuihousare, Kakushi Boss Beya ni Hourikomareta Kekka, Boss to Tansakushagari Haishin wo Hajimeru~@comic

altTitles.ja: 闇堕ち勇者の背信配信~追放され、隠しボス部屋に放り込まれた結果、ボスと探索者狩り配信を始める~@comic

description.en:
Fifty years have passed since dungeons first appeared on Earth. Dungeon exploration and live streaming are considered the norm for the people.

Kuga, who became a dungeon explorer alongside his close friends, ends up being banished from his party due to him being a supposed "jack of all trades, master of none" hero.

Amidst his despair, Kuga finds himself thrown into the hidden boss room, famous for making explorers unable to step foot into a dungeon ever again. There, he encounters a beautiful female vampire named Alicia.

Though he’s prepared to meet his end, Alicia, captivated by the so-called streaming, has other plans and asks him, "Could you teach me how to stream?"

With nowhere else to go, Kuga reluctantly accepts her proposal and thus begins their unprecedented dungeon explorer-hunting streams.

For some reason, their stream quickly went viral like crazy, and Kuga then began to awaken some unknown powers...?

And meanwhile, something strange is happening to the party members who banished Kuga...

title.en: Kono Koi wo Hoshi ni wa Negawanai

altTitles.ja: この恋を星には願わない

altTitles.en: There is No Love Wishing Upon a Star

description.en:
Eri-chan is my childhood friend whom I've always spent time with since we were little. Somewhere along the way, my affection for her shifted from being just friends to romantic feelings, but I doubt I'll ever confess these feelings to her. Because I want to stay by her side forever.

And so begins a delicate and beautiful love story where each person's 'love' intertwines.
description.ja: 幼い頃からいつも一緒に過ごしてきた冬葵と瑛莉と京。これまでずっと友達としての関係を続けてきたが、冬葵は瑛莉に対して友達以上の感情を抱いていた。そんなある日、３人は久々に遊園地に遊びにいくのだが、そこで冬葵は自身の恋が叶わぬものであると知ってしまい――

title.en: Kao dake yoi Classmate ga Yatara to Guigui Kuru Yuri no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 顔だけ良いクラスメイトがやたらとグイグイ来る百合の話

altTitles.en: A Yuri Story About How My Classmate Whose Only Good Trait Is Her Excessively Pretty Face Comes at Me Relentlessly

description.en:
"What can I do with a body that only has bones?"

Karnak had become the king of death using the forbidden secrets of "necromancy," but he began to reminisce the pleasures of the flesh, in sorrow of his bony body...

"I'll turn back time itself!"

After a long period of research, he succeeded in using the time regression spell and regressed to the past with his right hand, Baros.

"Uh... young master, I think the past has been changed."

This is the death king's project to straighten out his twisted(?) life!
description.ko:
"대체 뼈만 남은 몸으로 뭘 할 수 있느냔 말이야."

금단의 술법인 '사령술'로 모든 것을 손에 넣고죽음마저 지배하는 죽음의 왕이 된 카르나크.

하지만 뼈밖에 없는 몸으로 변한 탓에인간 시절의 '쾌락'을 그리워하게 되는데…

"시간을 되돌리겠다!"

오랜 연구 끝에 심복 '바로스'와 함께시공 회귀 마법에 성공해 과거로 돌아오게 된다.

"저기… 도련님, 과거가 바뀐 것 같은데요?"

과거로 돌아온 사령왕의 비뚤어진(?) 삶 바로잡기 프로젝트!

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.vi: Thợ Săn là những người đi chu du thế giới, đối mặt với hiểm nguy. Từ bắt giữ tội phạm cho đến nhưng cuộc thám hiểm trên các hòn đảo để tìm kho báu. Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi người cha của một cậu bé tên Gon mất tích đã khá lâu, nên cậu bé quyết định trở thành Thợ Săn với hy vọng tìm được cha mình. Khi được 12 tuổi Gon bắt đầu cuộc hành trình của mình để được tham gia vào "Cuộc thi Thợ Săn Kỳ Tài", ai cũng biết tỉ lệ thành công rất thấp, có khi chết lúc nào không hay. Trong cuộc thi cậu đã kết bạn với Kurapica, Leorio và Killua. Với tình bạn, họ đã trải qua biết bao nhiêu là thử thách, hiểm nguy trên cuộc hành trình của một người Thợ Săn... Còn về phần họ trải qua những thử thách gì và như thế nào thì mời các bạn theo dõi...
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.
